GROUP.name: AlterETicketMessages
GROUP.PROPERTY:
IMPORTANT NOTICE
SINGAPORE AIRLINES WILL CHARGE ONLY WHAT HAS BEEN QUOTED ABOVE.
IF YOU PAY WITH VISA/MASTERCARD YOU WILL ALSO INCUR CURRENCY CONVERSION
CHARGES BETWEEN VISA/MASTERCARD AND YOUR LOCAL KOREAN BANK.
THIS WILL NOT APPLY TO AMERICAN EXPRESS CARDHOLDERS.
